title: 2BD/1BA w/in unit washer & dryer
posting_body: Welcome to this lovely home on the hill with a suburban vibe, tree-lined streets and a combination of single and two-family homes.

This newly renovated unit features high ceilings, fireplaced living room, dining room, two good size bedrooms, one bathroom, tastefully renovated kitchen with recessed lighting, soft closed white cabinets, stainless steel appliances, gas range for cooking, and in-unit stack-able washer and dryer.
Hardwood floors throughout, gas heat by radiators, front and back porches.
Just a 2 minute walk to Centre Street features a thriving business mix of unique retailers, restaurants, banks, and entertainment options.
Enjoy 100 acres of trails, ball fields, and picnic areas at Millennium Park.

This location has a walkable score of 80 and provides easy access transit connections (Bus 24, 35, 36, 37, 38) to and from downtown Boston via Forest Hills and Ashmont Station, Commuter Rail to South Station via the Needham Line, access to I93, I95 via Dedham Providence Hwy
